newsitem.title: USA: Emerson to take controlling stake in Sport.
newsitem.headline: Emerson to take controlling stake in Sport.

text.p: Emerson Radio Corp said it reached an agreement to acquire a controlling stake in Sport Supply Group Inc and will spend $12 million to buy 1.6 million newly issued Sport shares.
Combined with Emerson's original investment in Sport Supply, the total transaction is valued at about $18.2 million, Emerson said.

Emerson said it is also acquiring five-year warrants to buy one million more shares of Sport Supply common stock at an exercise price of $7.50 per share under the deal. The company said it also will arrange for supplemental foreign trade credit financing for Sport Supply.
Emerson said the purchase is part of its strategy to diversify from its core business of consumer electronics distribution to other types of distribution businesses.
The company said the deal should be completed immediately after the 10-day notice period required by the Securities and Exchange Commission expires.
As part of the deal, Emerson will make up a majority of Sport Supply's board until a shareholder vote at the next annual meeting, Emerson said.
